plot outline: Due to the financial issues, a loving couple, Satish and Savitri begin to experience a crazy roller-coaster of emotions in their relationship. Where love is most important for Satish, materialistic gains are important for Savitri. She is distracted by her friends Chandni and Pooja's advice, and on the other hand, his friends Bhaskar and Dhamo try to pull him out of Savitri's money-driven interests.
title: Satti Par Satto
plot: Due to the financial issues, a loving couple, Satish and Savitri begin to experience a crazy roller-coaster of emotions in their relationship. Where love is most important for Satish, materialistic gains are important for Savitri. She is distracted by her friends Chandni and Pooja's advice, and on the other hand, his friends Bhaskar and Dhamo try to pull him out of Savitri's money-driven interests.
